sentences: Israel Salazar de Luna Freire (born 11 June 1990) is a Brazilian contemporary worship music singer and songwriter.
Salazar was born in Rio de Janeiro.
His first recording was 2009's Tua Visão.
In February 2013, Salazar served as arranger and one of the major composers of the album Nada Temerei, Ana Nóbrega, released by Som Livre label.
